structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

text.section: the effectiveness of the office of community corrections in promoting the goals of the commission;
the effectiveness of the office of community corrections in diverting offenders by reducing prison commitments;
the evaluations and recommendations submitted by the county community corrections advisory boards and by providers of community corrections programs;
fiscal audits on the expenditure of state funds;
allegations of provider noncompliance and the results of any investigations into such allegations.
